com.cmput301.recipebot.ui

Class AbstractRecipeActivity.WriteRecipeToFileTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Recipe,java.lang.Void,java.io.File>
      • com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.AbstractRecipeActivity.WriteRecipeToFileTask
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractRecipeActivity

     class AbstractRecipeActivity.WriteRecipeToFileTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<Recipe,java.lang.Void,java.io.File>
    A task that writes the recipe to a file for sharing. In our case, we're simply storing it as a Json file.
